trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cornwall
There were no other sightings in Cornwall on or around April 15th 2008
Summary: white object fast travelling across sky and then shot up very fast into atmosphere
divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing in front of my home there were other people on the street i looked up to the north east sky and very high up there was a white object egg shaped i think hard to tell from so far but it wasnt a plane it was travelling very fast north to south no contrail i tried to get my husband and daughters attention to it but by the time they looked it had shot up into the atmosphere in a second it crossed that sky very fast. for a second, because it was so white, i thought maybe it was a seagull and i was misinterpreting its distance however when it shot higher into the atmosphere i knew it wasnt a bird. i wish that someone else on the street was looking up but as is so typical in our society no one was looking up. since i saw it i have been going outside looking up there 6 or 7 times a day i cant forget. i want to see it again with someone who can tell me what it was.
